title: Senior Frontend Engineer
description: Building ecommerce websites on dotnet platform

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Joined EPAM as a React / JavaScript developer. No projects were assigned due to a layoff due to economic climate prevailing at that time

title: Software Engineer
description: Set up dev, QA and production environments for monthly release
Initiate change request and lead all release activities
Lead triage calls for any issues
Create and lead emergency release / postfix releases
Take ownership and troubleshoot build issues and fix working with devops team
Take part in daily standups and work closely with various scrum teams

title: Senior Analyst
description: Responsible for designing and developing landing page on SharePoint platform
Build and maintain sites and productivity tools for more than 50 businesses
Troubleshoot issue with SharePoint and take ownership of timely communication and addressal of issues
Ensure tasks are updated and closed on JIRA and participate in daily standups, retrospectives and planning meetings

title: Business Support Analyst
description: Frontfacing a 450 plus headcount IT vertical working with portfolio management team
Lead and run leadership meetings and drive agenda
Workforce management, billing and forecasting, seating and planning
Issue management, business continuity planning and execution
Drive initiatives and performance
Reporting and dashboards for business meetings
Own risk and compliance for the business
Additionally developed and maintained a team site on SharePoint for the business management team
designed and developed a landing page and data collection site for a major skill enhancement initiative

title: Team Manager
description: Lead various high performing teams in operations
Drive performance, conduction appraisals and feedback sessions
Drive initiatives and team building activities
Conflict resolution and people issue resolution
